TopicTitle: Shouldn't I have two of the green things under the username now?

Articles.Content: I've got more than 50 rep points (60) now, so where is it?
They go by hundreds, not fifties.

Unfortunately we don't control the green bars displaying, they are hard-coded into vBulletin. The dark green bars are worth 100 reputation each, whereas the light green bars represent 200 reputation each.
Oh that's why it's when I reach 100. Too bad.
Also halp my dev blogs dissapeared from the "Front Page" of the forum.

Also halp my dev blogs dissapeared from the "Front Page" of the forum.

I've noticed this as well.
That may be to reduce load on the server.
Yep, Kasper's been forced to nuke certain forum functions in order to alleviate the 502 errors.

Unfortunately we don't control the green bars displaying, they are hard-coded into vBulletin. The dark green bars are worth 100 reputation each, whereas the light green bars represent 200 reputation each.

The first light green bar is only worth 100. Last dark one appears at 400, first light one at 500.
